titleStmt.title: The Covenant with a narrative of the proceedings and solemn manner of taking it by the honourable House of Commons and reverent Assembly of Divines the 25th day of September, at Saint Margarets in Westminster : also two speeches delivered at the same time, the one by Mr. Philip Nye, the other by Mr. Alexander Hendersam.
titleStmt.author: Henderson, Alexander, 1583?-1646.
Nye, Philip, 1596?-1672.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
